data.name: Tomorrow's Past
data.detailed_description:
An open world multiplayer game. Explore a crime ridden city. Buying and growing black market businesses to make your way to the top. Get your hands dirty in counterfeit cash, assassination's services, and even own and operate your own night club. Spend your new cash on extravagant apartments, garages, and cars. With a tone of control and customization over your businesses. You wont find anywhere better to spend your time.

You can create mobs with your friends and become bigger and stronger. Even own parts of the map with your mob.
When you create mobs, all of your members that join the mob will be taxed, and that money will go towards the mob.
Expect MOB WARS in the near future

Basically organized crime, the game!
data.about_the_game:
An open world multiplayer game. Explore a crime ridden city. Buying and growing black market businesses to make your way to the top. Get your hands dirty in counterfeit cash, assassination's services, and even own and operate your own night club. Spend your new cash on extravagant apartments, garages, and cars. data.short_description: Explore a city lost in time. Run extensive black market businesses with your friends! Battle other groups of people for control over the city and its resources. Become the Mob Boss you've always wanted to be!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 32 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: The game will continue to be improved to run on lower end hardware!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2080
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 32 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
